Vehicle_reliability_hidden = {

		allow = {
			 has_country_flag = impossible
		}

		usa_second_cavgroup = {
			maximum_speed = 0.15
			toughness = 0.3
			defensiveness = 1.1
		}

		usa_threesevenzero_rct = {
			maximum_speed = 0.15
			toughness = 0.3
			defensiveness = 1.1
		}

		usa_fourfourtwo_rct = {
			maximum_speed = 0.15
			toughness = 0.3
			defensiveness = 1.1
		}

		usa_onefiveeight_rct = {
			maximum_speed = 0.15
			toughness = 0.3
			defensiveness = 1.1
		}

	stealable = no
	difficulty = 1
	start_year = 1960
	first_offset = 1961
	additional_offset = 1
	max_level = 12

}

		allow = {
			 has_country_flag = impossible
		}

		usa_second_cavgroup = {
	        defensiveness = 0.6
	        soft_attack = 1.2
	    }

		usa_threesevenzero_rct = {
	        defensiveness = 0.6
	        soft_attack = 1.2
	    }

		usa_fourfourtwo_rct = {
	        defensiveness = 0.6
	        soft_attack = 1.2
	    }

		usa_onefiveeight_rct = {
	        defensiveness = 0.6
	        soft_attack = 1.2
	    }

	difficulty = 1

	first_offset = 1961
	additional_offset = 1

}

urban_Fighting_Equipment_and_Training_hidden = {

		allow = {
			 has_country_flag = impossible
		}

		ger_kampfgruppe_schultz = {
	        urban = {
	            attack = 0.15
	            defence = 0.12
	        }
			#build_time = 5
			#build_cost_ic = 1
	    }

tank_optics_hidden = {

		allow = {
			 has_country_flag = impossible
		}

		GER_pzthirtyfive_rgt = {
			defensiveness = 1.5
			toughness = 1.5
			soft_attack = 0.5
			hard_attack = 1
			#build_cost_ic = 0.2
			ap_attack = 0
		}

		GER_pzthirtyeight_rgt = {
			defensiveness = 1.5
			toughness = 1.5
			soft_attack = 0.5
			hard_attack = 1
			#build_cost_ic = 0.2
			ap_attack = 0
		}

	stealable = no
	difficulty = 1
	start_year = 1960
	first_offset = 1961
	additional_offset = 1
	max_level = 3

}

		}

		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}

		max_strength = 36
		sea_attack = 9.0
		convoy_attack = 3.69
		maximum_speed = 1
		range = 400
		sea_defence = 3.15
		air_defence = 4.68
		hull = 0.54
		build_cost_ic = -0.65
		positioning = 0.05
	}
 	SBB_Musashi = {
		max_strength = 36
		sea_attack = 9.0
		convoy_attack = 3.69
		maximum_speed = 1
		range = 400
		sea_defence = 3.15
		air_defence = 4.68
		hull = 0.54
		build_cost_ic = -0.65
		positioning = 0.05

largewarship_air_detection_radar_hidden = {

	allow = {
		 has_country_flag = impossible
	}
	BB_Missouri = {
		air_detection = 1
	}

		air_detection = 1
	}

		air_detection = 1
	}
